mapper.select: SELECT sk.`shopid`,se.`sizename`,cd.`colorname`,sp.`shopname`,sp.`price`,sp.`proreview`,sp.`Oriprice`,sg.`filename`,cd.`colorid` FROM `shopstock` sk INNER JOIN `size` se ON sk.`sizeid`=se.`sizeid` INNER JOIN `colors` cd ON sk.`colorid`=cd.`colorid` INNER JOIN `shop` sp ON sk.`shopid`=sp.`shopid` INNER JOIN `shopimg` sg ON sk.`colorid`=sg.`colorsid` WHERE sk.`shopid`=#{id} AND sg.`shopid`=#{id} GROUP BY cd.`colorname`
SELECT se.`sizename` FROM `shopstock` sk INNER JOIN `size` se ON sk.`sizeid`=se.`sizeid` WHERE sk.`shopid`=#{id} GROUP BY se.`sizename`

SELECT sg.filename,cs.`colorname` FROM `shopimg` sg INNER JOIN `colors` cs ON sg.`colorsid`=cs.`colorid`
WHERE sg.shopid=#{id}
